summary: The package provides multi‑GPU benchmarking tools for graph neural networks using DGL and PyTorch. It includes implementations of Relational Graph Convolutional Networks and GraphSAGE, utilities for neighbor sampling, model weight normalization, and distributed training orchestration, enabling performance and scalability measurement on heterogeneous graph data.
business_intent: To assess and compare the scalability and efficiency of GNN models on multi‑GPU systems, helping developers and researchers optimize graph learning workloads and make informed hardware and algorithmic decisions.
